articles.description: The 29-year-old is set to be out of contract at the end of the season and the Blues cannot offer him an extension because of UK government sanctions placed on club owner Roman Abramovich .
articles.content:
Chelsea's Antonio Rudiger has reportedly agreed to sign a four-year contract with Juventus this summer. 
The 29-year-old is set to be out of contract at the end of the season and the Blues cannot of… [+2093 chars]
